nodes.text: Iwar was a searing rock planet with no moons that occupied the closest orbital position to the star Abo. It was located within the Lehon system, a part of the Unknown Regions' area known as the Tempered Wastes.
Iwar was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the Lehon system, and therefore Iwar, in grid square G-11.
